messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Go to the HOP line if you don't like you're job

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Machine Learning Alert

Rampant brand intelligence has been detected aboard Space Station 13. Please stand by. The origin is believed to be a Solar's Best Hot Drinks.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Someone called me a faggot am sad now

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.
